title: Man accidentally shot while bird hunting in Wexford County
content:
WEXFORD COUNTY, Mi (WPBN/WGTU)-- A 53-year-old man was injured after deputies say he was accidentally shot.
The incident happened Sunday around 8:30 a.m.
According to the Wexford County Sheriff's Office, a group was bird hunting when one group member was accidentally shot.
Deputies say the 53-year-old Interlochen man was transported to a hospital where he is listed in stable condition.
The incident remains under investigation.
